Now I don’t even know what you have seen. Why do you feel the need to shit on every accomplishment we make? And they are far and few between
now. Why do you insist on creating conflict in the shadow of success? I just don’t get why you are so compelled to behave that way. Christ, Christine.
Can’t you even for a brief moment allow anything positive in our life? I just don’t get it. Do you hate our children that much?
